roleset.name: assign attribute
roleset.note: ASCRIBE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'ascribe' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from ascribe.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: active
example.text: Both Deryck C. Maughan, who heads Salomon in Tokyo, and John S. Wadsworth, who heads Morgan Stanley there, ascribe a good part of their firms' success in Tokyo to their ability to offer sophisticated, futures-related investment strategies to big institutional clients.
example.arg: Both Deryck C. Maughan, who heads Salomon in Tokyo, and John S. Wadsworth, who heads Morgan Stanley there,
a good part of their firms' success in Tokyo
to their ability to offer sophisticated, futures-related investment strategies to big institutional clients

example.name: passive
example.text: As a public figure, Mr. Masson had to prove malice and, as proof of malice, Mr. Masson contended that [defamatory quotations]-2 ascribed *trace*-2 to him by Ms. Malcolm were in fact fabricated.
